header.title: Create a Mobile Home, Create Happiness.
header.subTitle: We are committed to providing you and your family with smart EVs that are safer, more comfortable and more convenient.

section1.title: Hello! We Are Li Auto.
section1.subTitle: Li Auto is aiming for an all-electric lineup including one super-flagship "Mega" model, five REEV models, and five high-voltage BEV models by 2025 to offer families a diverse range of choice in the CNY 200,000 price bracket.

section2.title: We Create Mobile Homes
section2.subTitle: With REEV and pure electric power options, we are leading the renewable energy revolution to replace gasoline vehicles.

section3.title: A More Convenient Energy Solution
section3.subTitle: With REEV and pure electric power options, we are leading the renewable energy revolution to replace gasoline vehicles.

card1.title: Li Auto's REEV Platform
card1.subTitle: Uses power during city driving, generates power during long-distance drives, and supplies power for camping.

card2.title: Li Auto 800V High-voltage Battery Electric Platform
card2.subTitle: 5C batteries offer a range of 500 km from a 12-minute charge. Charge your car at 5G speed.
card2.subTitle2: The data is based on self-testing of optimal charging performance, and the charging speed and range may vary depending on the vehicle model, vehicle condition, and usage.

section4.title: AI-powered Service for Family Users
section4.subTitle: All models come standard with smart driving features and multi-screen voice interaction, enabling AI to grow with your family together.

card1.title: Pilot Assistance With a Lifetime Free Subscription
card1.subTitle: Making smart driving features standard for everyone.

card2.title: Innovative Five-screen 3D Spatial Interaction
card2.subTitle: A smart cabin for every family member.
card2.subTitle2: *The data is based on self-testing of optimal charging performance, and the charging speed and range may vary depending on the vehicle model, vehicle condition, and usage.

section5.title: Future Avant-garde with full execution, which changes human life
section5.subTitle: Unleash the power of embodying rationality and technology through emotional design

card-1.title: Future Avant-garde Design Language
card-1.subTitle: We consistently adhere to the principle of "Less but Better" in our design approach. The aesthetics of our products are intended to highlight the rational functionality and the technological value they embody. This design philosophy is reflected in every step of the design process, from innovative exterior forms, thoughtful layout of intelligent spaces within, to the selection of component materials and the definition of exquisite craftsmanship.

card-2.title: Rational thinking
card-2.subTitle: We start by envisioning the innovative ways to provide users with the lifestyle they aspire to in their desired usage scenarios.

card-3.title: Technological value
card-3.subTitle: We are committed to using innovative technological solutions to address real-life issues and enhance the well-being of households.

card-4.title: Sensational design
card-4.subTitle: With our "Future Avant-garde" design language, we strive to strike a balance between full-bodied forms and exquisite details, creating warm and joyful homes for our users.

section6.title: Our Creativity
section6.subTitle: Li Auto's self-developed core technologies and factory are key to making your perfect mobile home.

card-1.title: Core Technologies
card-1.subTitle: REEV, 800V High-voltage Battery Electric Platform, multi-screen, voice-controlled interaction technology, Magic Carpet Air Suspension™ and Pilot Assistance are all developed by Li Auto.

card-2.title: Smart Manufacturing
card-2.subTitle: Our own smart manufacturing bases in Changzhou and Beijing cover stamping, welding, painting, final assembly, quality testing, logistics, IT, and other vehicle production processes.

card-3.title: Direct Sales Network
card-3.subTitle: We provide transparent, convenient, and efficient services via our direct sales system. As of March 31, 2023, there are 314 retail centers in 124 cities across China, and 319 service centers and authorized paint workshops in 222 cities across China.

card-4.title: Direct Sales Network
card-4.subTitle: We provide transparent, convenient, and efficient services via our direct sales system. As of March 31, 2023, there are 314 retail centers in 124 cities across China, and 319 service centers and authorized paint workshops in 222 cities across China.

card-5.title: Our Values
card-5.subTitle: Our mission is to master our fate and challenge the limits of growth. Our core value is to exceed the needs of users by creating superior products and services.

section8.title: Create the Future Together With Li Auto
section8.subTitle: We encourage users to help us improve our products and services, as well as inspire us with creative ideas.

card-1.title: Creating Products
card-1.subTitle: Whether it is a function definition or OTA update, honest feedback from users is a source of power for product improvement.

card-2.title: Always Innovating
card-2.subTitle: AI TaskFlex, Tuning Master, AI Painting Master, on-board browser—Your ideas inspire us to explore more ways to interact with the vehicle.
card-2.subTitle2: Users can share tips on Task Master

card-3.title: Create Your Lifestyle
card-3.subTitle: We created the Bed Mode based on user feedback so you can truly enjoy the outdoors.

section9.title: Share Your Dreams with Li Auto
section9.subTitle: For Li Auto owners, their vehicle is their study room, bedroom, and living room, and for kids, it is their magic castle.
